content:
Did you know your co-chairs put in effort planning your/our meetings? It ain't easy sometimes but boy is it important.

One thing we did today was go back to our April document that lists our priority projects and clean it up (removing dust) and reorganizing it to clearly show which items need to be shepherded through the (daunting and moving-target) HL7 process. Here's the revised document, and for the terminally lazy (or time-pressed) I'll also attach it as a PDF. (Did you know Confluence pages have "Export to PDF" in the "..." menu at top right? Neither did I.)
